backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles with authorization plus generators for test cases, bugs, and corner cases tied to website records.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module returning an empty state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/DEPLOY_MAINNET.md: Guide detailing prerequisites and steps for deploying the app to IC mainnet.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md: Auto‑generated file meant to store mainnet deployment URLs and canister IDs.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining light/dark theme tokens and base CSS resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/domainName.js: CLI utility for validating and normalizing domain names according to IC constraints.
frontend/scripts/publishMainnetAndRecord: Automated script to validate app name, deploy to mainnet, fetch canister IDs, and record deployment artifacts.
frontend/scripts/recordDeploymentArtifac: CLI script that resolves canister IDs and regenerates DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md with deployment URLs and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app's router, defining all main routes for dashboard, bugs, test cases, test runs, and web app testing with layout and auth guards.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout component providing the header, navigation, footer, and container structure for all pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wrapper that restricts access to authenticated users, showing a login prompt or loading state when needed.
frontend/src/components/SectionPage.tsx: Section layout component that displays a page title, optional description and actions, and wrapped content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hook managing Internet Identity login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, websites, and test cases via an actor client.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/urlValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes URLs, ensuring protocol and hostname correctness.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility wrapper combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/lib/websiteSelection.ts: Manages selected website ID using URL parameters and localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BugDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific bug using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/BugListPage.tsx: Lists bugs for the selected website and handles empty, loading, and no-selection states.
frontend/src/pages/BugUpsertPage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing a bug with client-side state and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing QA stats, recent activity, and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/TestCaseDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a specific test case using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/TestCaseListPage.tsx: Lists test cases for the selected website with handling for loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TestCaseUpsertPage.ts: Form page for creating or editing a test case with local state and mock submission.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunCreatePage.tsx: Allows users to name a test run and select test cases to include before creating it.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunExecutePage.ts: Guides users through executing tests in a run, recording pass/fail results and notes.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunListPage.tsx: Displays a list of mock test runs with status badges and navigation to create or view individual runs.
frontend/src/pages/TestRunSummaryPage.ts: Shows a detailed summary of a single test run, including pass/fail counts and individual result cards.
frontend/src/pages/WebAppTestingPage.tsx: Implements the URL‑based test data generator and CRUD interface for test cases, bugs, and corner cases tied to selected websites.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines Vite environment variable typings for build-time configuration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, color tokens, plugins, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, feature requirements, known issues, and pending requests for the URL-based testing generator workflow.
